pages.text: At this point, Create on a Potato PC: Sky Edition plays like a vanilla SkyBlock, $(o)though with some great tools and weapons$(). Expect this section to be heavily edited in future releases. Player input is welcome!

pages.title: Copper Paxel
pages.text: Make a Copper Paxel as soon as you can! The Copper Paxel is a multi-tool (combination: pickaxe, axe, and shovel) and will allow you to continuously mine, regardless of the block spawned.

pages.title: Tools
pages.text: Once you get a copper paxel, try to get the full set of copper armor, weapons, and tools. Copper is easy to get and is repaired in a crafting grid with ingots. Go to the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/easy-emerald-tools)Emerald Tools page$(/l) to see the mod content, material durability, and much more! Try searching REI with "@em"

pages.title: Tools
pages.text: Mobs do spawn while mining the re-spawnable block. There fore, be prepared!
